meta.title: Agent Vibes Dashboard
meta.description: Comprehensive insights into AI coding assistants and market sentiment

highlights.title: Cursor AI introduces new context-aware code completion
highlights.summary: Major update brings 40% improvement in code suggestion accuracy with enhanced multi-file context understanding and real-time debugging assistance.

highlights.title: Stanford study: AI coding assistants boost productivity by 35%
highlights.summary: Comprehensive study of 2,000 developers shows significant productivity gains, with junior developers benefiting most from AI assistance in debugging and code review tasks.

highlights.title: GitHub Copilot discussion trending on Reddit
highlights.summary: Developer community discussing new pricing model changes. Mixed reactions with 60% positive sentiment, concerns about enterprise pricing and feature limitations.

highlights.title: The future of pair programming with AI assistants
highlights.summary: Thoughtful analysis on how AI coding tools are reshaping collaborative development practices, exploring both opportunities and challenges for team dynamics.

productUpdates.title: Amp v2.3 released with enhanced NLP capabilities
productUpdates.summary: Major update includes enhanced natural language processing, improved code generation accuracy, and new debugging features. Performance improvements show 25% faster response times.

productUpdates.title: New context-aware code completion algorithm
productUpdates.summary: Revolutionary update brings 40% improvement in code suggestion accuracy with enhanced multi-file context understanding and real-time debugging assistance.

productUpdates.title: Pricing model updates and enterprise features
productUpdates.summary: New pricing structure introduces tier-based access to advanced features. Enterprise customers get enhanced security controls and usage analytics.

research.title: NLP Benchmark Study: Code Generation Performance Analysis
research.summary: Comprehensive evaluation of 15 AI coding assistants across 5,000 programming tasks. Introduces CodeBench-2025 benchmark with focus on real-world debugging scenarios.

research.title: AI Coding Assistants: Enterprise Adoption Report 2025
research.summary: Survey of 500 enterprise development teams shows 78% adoption rate. Key drivers include productivity gains (average 30% faster development) and code quality improvements.

perspectives.title: The future of pair programming with AI assistants
perspectives.summary: Thoughtful analysis on how AI coding tools are reshaping collaborative development practices, exploring both opportunities and challenges for team dynamics.
perspectives.author: Tech Lead @Meta

social.title: GitHub Copilot pricing discussion trending
social.summary: Developer community discussing new pricing model changes. Mixed reactions with 60% positive sentiment, concerns about enterprise pricing and feature limitations.
